activities: Data is transferred to, and stored and processed in the United States.  Ngmoco uses this data to develop, deliver, and improve online services, to process billing and payments, to conduct marketing and analysis, to notify users, and to provide user support.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online customer end user data processed electronically
recoursemech: Users are encouraged to contact ngmoco in the event of any inquiry or dispute concerning ngmoco's privacy policies.  If an inquiry or complaint cannot be resolved by way of our internal processes, ngmoco commits to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs), the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), or their authorized representatives.
